Name: Vaccine
About the game: Introducing the unlimited hexagonal puzzler for Windows and Mac, You will master simple levels in an addicting and challenging missions to save the world! Endless mode ensures you have a unique and complete escape. Play anywhere! Free Android version with purchase!
